review: Dr Anuja Was very friendly and explained the problems in detail. She heard all the problems in detail and gave answer to all our queries. Her diagnosis was spot on . She also detailed why certain medicines are prescribed and helped me understand how long it will take me to recover fully, which is exactly how many days it took me. Very satisfied overall
Awesome doctor….Very friendly, understands your concern and do what’s right  … will 100% recommend to all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited doctor after health checkup. She has gone through reports and explained the factors involved. She preferred diet plan change and few medicine. Also when any concern about medicine she is prompt to provide necessary details.

I always recommend Dr Anuja Lakra. she is very friendly  with the patient n always explain the problem of the patient as well as the medicine. she has well experienced in the field of medicine and others as well.
